setup_instructions: 1. Create an IAM user in AWS Console with Bedrock permissions
2. Generate access keys for the IAM user
3. Replace the example credentials above with your actual credentials
4. Choose a region where Bedrock is available (us-east-1, us-west-2, etc.)
5. Ensure your IAM user has the 'bedrock:InvokeModel' permission
security_notes: Never commit actual credentials to version control
Use AWS IAM best practices (least privilege principle)
Consider using AWS STS temporary credentials for enhanced security
